website_summaries.verdict: An oversized bean bag chair that both children and grown ups can appreciate.
pros: Features a lightweight covering on a comfortable bag
A zipper opening allows for easy refill and washing of the cover
Works well for adults as well as kids
cons: When you unzip, you may find holes in the inner liner

customer_reviews.title: Needs way more beans
customer_reviews.text: Flat as a pancake. Don't buy unless you plan on buying lots of extra beans.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Greenleaf

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, kind of flat since first day, you need to order refill to make it usable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for reading
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my wife's library/craft room. She wanted something that she could just hang out and read on but didn't really have any space to fit a standard style chair/recliner. This was both an effective and cheap solution to that problem. It's comfortable enough for her to hang out for an hour or two with no discomfort. It looks good and is just big enough for her yet not too big for the small room that we have it in.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Best investment
customer_reviews.text: The material is like a light weight canvas. The bean bag was going to go in my guest room but I love it so much that it has been staying in my living room for when I watch TV or write a note. I really like this bean bag chair AND it is really FULL of "beans".
customer_reviews.author: EarlenesTrueReviews

customer_reviews.title: Content with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Cute, cute, cute. My daughter had a vinyl bean bag before but i should have heeded to the responses. Many of them stated how it tore and the styrofoam beads went every where. And I found out...yes they did and they are DIFFICULT to get up; they stick to everything. So I found this oversized bag online and I highly recommend it. It is cloth, which is a plus, and it is very sturdy. I haven't scotch guarded it yet but it has done pretty well in regards to staining. I am content.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Blue

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a beanbag chair big enough to support my head while I am sitting in it. This one does (note: I am only 5'3"). I especially like the zip off cover, as I can wash it. Also thecloth is far more comfortable than the plastic covers of the beanbag chairs of my youth! I am quite happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Inner bag failed
customer_reviews.text: I liked this bean bag a lot and it would have been a 5 rating but the inner bag is cheaply made. I just happened to open it up within 6 months of purchase to find that the sewing around the zipper had failed and there are now thousands of beads loose between the inner and outer lining. There goes easy washability. I sewd it up but it's too late now.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lee

customer_reviews.title: This is great so far
customer_reviews.text: This is great so far! I read some reviews which said it was pretty flat. The one I received was plenty full. I was actually impressed, and it is so confortable. It comes with a cover that can me removed for washing. Thank goodness. It had a small lock on it so kiddos can't take it off easily. Pretty clutch. I bought it for children and for them it is oversized. In my opinion, it is pretty big. It's definitely oversized for the kiddos, and it's pretty big for me as well.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna Jones Kaul

customer_reviews.title: I bought two of these, one in navy, ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one in navy, the other green. They arrived on the same day. I unboxed them and the navy one was filled as expected. However, the green one had HALF the filling of the navy one. Two of the same product, the only difference is color and they arrived very differently. I was bummed and so were my kids that I bought them for, well the kid that got the green one was bummed! The quality control this company has is very inconsistent throughout their products. I would not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Momtotwo

customer_reviews.title: Beans flattening after only 3 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: The bean bag is made of nice material, but I bought it for my daughter for Christmas and now 3 months later it is already flattening out she only weighs 60 lbs and sits in it on weekends. I feel like it should hold its shape better. I planned on buying one for our next daughter who is toddler but am looking at some other brands. A lot of. $ to not last.
customer_reviews.author: Britt84

customer_reviews.title: Would be 5 star if...
customer_reviews.text: Immediately upon opening box I see the bean bag is filthy! Looks like it was run over or stepped all over! Box was sealed so was packed that way & did not happen during shipping. Disappointing. Docked a star. Very next thing I notice is a strong chemical smell. Not good for an adult let alone my daughters nursery! Docked another star. Other than that love it. Perfect color. Very glad I didn’t listen to reviews & buy a bag of beans. Came very full. I’m actually going to take some out. So they must have fixed that problem or it’s only certain colors.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Very durable design, big, and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved this for her Christmas present. I got a chance to sit down on it and try it out for myself. Here's a few pros and cons to justify the 4 star rating. Pros: -Large(big enough for an adult) -Durable stitching and fabric -Comfortable Cons: -Stuffing not as viscous as a normal bean bag -Hard to form to desired shape. While, it is difficult to form, once you do get it to your desired shape it is very comfortable. If I had to make the purchase over again, I would probably buy the same bean bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan L

customer_reviews.title: The pink polka dots are so very cute and the large size of the bag makes it the perfect cloud-like experience for a pre-schooler
customer_reviews.text: This chair was a huge hit. The pink polka dots are so very cute and the large size of the bag makes it the perfect cloud-like experience for a pre-schooler. It has been in daily use for 7 months and is still maintaining its fullness. I have had other bean bags that get compressed over the course of a few months but this one has really surpassed my expectations for robustness against the torture of one very jumpy 4 year old. Well worth the price and I would buy it again many times over.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lovell

customer_reviews.title: This thing is massive!
customer_reviews.text: I was ordering this for a 7 year old and wanted to make sure I wasn't getting something too tiny. Well....this thing is MASSIVE. We sit on it together and it's turned out to be perfect for us but if you're looking for something more in the medium size range this isn't it. It's incredibly sturdy considering my son likes to run and jump on it and it looks new despite being almost 2 years old now (late reviewing it).
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Moore

customer_reviews.title: Oversized means oversized!
customer_reviews.text: These are really awesome! Very big (My 8 year old and 6 year old swim in them, which they love). Pretty sturdy fabric, light as a feather, and totally cute and comfy. Only problem I can see is that the light pastel colors we got (one in lilac, one in pink) are probably going to show every dog hair and smudge. But, that was my selection, not a product flaw at all. Ordered them 5 days before Christmas, they arrived 3 days before Christmas like clockwork.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Best bean bag ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have always purchased bean bags for my dog's bed. She is almost 13 years old now, and has been through several bean bags. This is by far the best one we have ever purchased - even better than the 3 we purchased from a local furniture store. It was so full we even removed some of the beans from inside, and it has an outside cover that we can remove and wash and it coubel zips and locks! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: T.W.

customer_reviews.title: Great bean bag for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves this bean bag! It is quite large. She loves to sit in it. The first night she even slept in it. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: cute and big, but smells like chemicals
customer_reviews.text: it's cute and big enough for me to sit next to my 4YO daughter or with her on my lap (which is what I wanted) however, it emits a chemical smell and I am concerned for my daughter to sleep w it in her room. If the smell doesn't go away within a week, I will have to return it. I spend a lot of time and energy making sure my kids eat all natural, and def don't want them breathing chemicals and sabotaging all my efforts.
customer_reviews.author: HLKNYC

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this expensive junk
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible bean bag chair. The inner bag broke within three months. And, the whole chair was now like a deflated balloon (see photo for the size compared with a 15” Mac book pro), not useable! Had contacted seller for refund, and had not seen response. Avoid this expensive junk.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Huang

customer_reviews.title: Starts a bit firm, but that's much better than a deflated bean bag! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: It took a few months to break it in. Meaning it was a bit overstuffed and firm in the beginning. But I think that is much better than the alternative of a bean bag that basically deflates within a week. I've had it for about 10 months now and it's doing great!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: HUMONGOUS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the reading nook i promised my daughter. This thing is HUGE! So great for the money. Bean bag chairs can get really expensive, This one is adorable, big, and perfect. My daughter is a big 4 year old but honestly she and I and my 6 year old son can ALL sit in it and read our bedtime story. I washed the cover before using it and it is perfect. My only issue was hiding this gigantic thing before christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Leah N.

customer_reviews.title: Large and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This item was much larger than I expected it to be, and is in constant use in our house since it came into it two months ago. I know that's not long, but it has so far stood up to daily use very well. It seems well-constructed, and I don't see any reason it shouldn't continue to hold up. I decided to go with this bean-bag rather than some of the less-expensive alternatives I saw on Amazon and I am glad I did. It's stuffed plenty, but not too much, and is quite large enough for my 5 foot-plus eleven-year-old to get comfortable in.
customer_reviews.author: C.Wilson

customer_reviews.title: My family loves this product, would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my toddler. He absolutely LOVES it. This bean bag has made our cuddle time extra-cozy, we use this daily and my son loves to just run around then jump into it, again, HE LOVES IT. Yes, it has lost some of it's density, but I'm not sure there is any way around the settling. I MUST SAY THIS THING IS SO EASY TO CLEAN! I have washed the cover in my washer every week for 3/4 of a year and it has held up wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: MIA

customer_reviews.title: Cool comfortable chair
customer_reviews.text: I've really been enjoying this chair for the living room. It is quite comfortable (for one adult at a time) and comes fully assembled with the beans in it. A good amount of beans were in it too- not deflated or overstuffed like some chairs. Seems to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: BlaireTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Good Size
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is a good size! The material covering it can be removed for washing, while an inner layer houses all of the stuffing. I am still trying to find out why the zipper has keys on the tab and a lock that the keys fit into...tried to see if this locked the zipper in place, but it seems as if it is just for show?? There is plenty of stuffing, contrary to what I have been reading in some of the reviews. This bean bag is large enough for even sizeable adults to use. It's comfy too!
customer_reviews.author: Kilgore Trout

customer_reviews.title: Great bean bag, would recommend in an instant
customer_reviews.text: This bean bag chair is awesome! It came fully packed and it was very reasonable in price. We've been using it for over 3 months and everyone loves it. The material is comfy but very durable feeling, and the beads are small meaning you almost never feel them. We thought it was a little overstuffed, but that's a way better problem than it being under-stuffed.
customer_reviews.author: Vick

customer_reviews.title: Definitely will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: The bean bag is pretty big, enough to fit my three children. I was worried that it would be made of a pretty cheap quality, but it seems like it’s made a pretty sturdy canvas. So I’m not worried about it popping as some have described, and it’s also still very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of mixed reviews on this product, but I was very pleasantly surprised by our order. I ordered the green dot bean bag for my 10-year-old daughter to read on. What a sweet product! The bean bag chair is not over or under-stuffed. I'd say it's just right and actually looks like the picture. It is big enough that I sit on it myself without any trouble. Overall, a good purchase for the money if you're in the market for a bean bag chair.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I cannot remember how big the description said it was but It's a great size for someone to snuggle into
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bean bag chair. I cannot remember how big the description said it was but It's a great size for someone to snuggle into. The quality of the chair material is holding up very nicely. I highly recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Gary G

customer_reviews.title: Works for every "body".
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these for when we have a lot of family over and run out of seating. We have all sizes of people, tall, heavy set, and little grandkids. This bean bag works for anyone. The downside is that our 17 year old took one of them into his room in front of his gaming console and I'm pretty sure we won't get it back.... ever. :)
customer_reviews.author: Terri Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Great color. Perfectly filled
customer_reviews.text: Great color. Perfectly filled. (not overstuffed or puny as others have stated) Had it a month and so far it seems to be withstanding rowdy kid play. Fits kids and adults alike. Daughter likes to sit in it like its a nest when she reads and curls up in it when its movie night. No complaints thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Amy74

customer_reviews.title: Sitting on a rock
customer_reviews.text: It's not cushy. I sit in it and it mostly forms to me but it's like a molded rock. Once I'm in it. The old school ones were squishy after I sat in them. Not this one. You have to get out of it to reposition for a better fit. I'm keeping it. My toddler enjoys being tossed on it and maybe it'll soften up over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Bri D

customer_reviews.title: Easy extra chair
customer_reviews.text: It served my purpose. I ordered it for my son for my visit because I have back issues and can't sit in an ordinary chair or couch. I can customize the shape of a beanbag. The problem is that the old kind had no inner bag and shaped easier and more comfortably. The inner bag prevents leaking and makes it easier to wash, so I get it, but my back prefers comfort. For the money, it was a good solution to my problem.
customer_reviews.author: Marlin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love it. It's big, comfy and seems like someone is always sprawled out in it watching t.v.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Very large, light, perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This was a very good size. Bigger than original bean bags from the seventies. Light weight compared to the shredded memory foam bags, which I don’t recommend. This chair can be easily moved and lifted with one hand. Washable as well. Has original bead stuffing.
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. A little overfull which is perfect because I can take some out and save it for later when it needs a little puffing up again. Yeah. I love it! My husband loves it! My grandkids love it! And, oh yeah! I love that the outer zipper locks and then there's a DOUBLE inner zipper for assuring NO accidental opening and spilling of the beads.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne K.

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and color, and so far (after a year) they seem fairly durable. Since we ordered 2, we were able to compare the consistency in quality. One bag seemed half filled compared to the other, making it less comfortable and harder to stand up or sit down. And then there are the arguments over who gets the bigger one....
customer_reviews.author: Kelly SLP

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This bean bag chair is huge and everything that I expected it would be. My daughter is 7 and she loves it. It is plenty big enough for her to grow with for several years. I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Bell

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a rock!
customer_reviews.text: Bean bag looks adorable for our daughters room but is rock hard to sit on. Not only will you not sink into it, but you'll end up sitting on the outer edge with no filling under you trying to find a comfortable position. I bought the bean bag chair to create a reading nook for her in her room but unfortunately we just end up on her bed because using this bean bag is a sacrifice to our comfort.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters and they absolutely love it!!! They are 7 and 1 and they both can fit it in together comfortably. I love the fact that you can take the cover off and wash it, very durable. Even my 2 little dogs love to lay in it.
customer_reviews.author: holly

customer_reviews.title: OMG!!😁😁😁😁
customer_reviews.text: After shopping around and the mixed reviews....WE HAVE THE PERFECT BEAN BAG!!! Delivered on time and pre-filled!!! Purchased for my 12 yr old....big enough for me! Great purchase!!!! 5 stars +++++++++
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically reminds me of the twill Pottery Barn Kids version.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this - so will update as it wears... Nice navy color, the cover is a quality twill. I wanted something like a large Pottery Barn Kids bean bag (but didn't want to spend $200) this looks close to their version aesthetically. Sitting on it, so far so good. Now let my kids run wild with and I'll update.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M.

customer_reviews.title: Love em!!
customer_reviews.text: We think the color and quality of this item is really good. Weve only had them a few weeks, but they haven't deflated at all. If youve had beanbags in the past, you know they ALL deflate over time - so i ordered the refill beans when Ordered the bag. Good quality construction. Love em!
customer_reviews.author: UrbanRuralMomma

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased.
customer_reviews.text: The bean bag cover has held up but when I took it off to wash it I noticed a large hole in the bag itself and there were tons of Styrofoam pieces all over my floor. Not pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hamer

customer_reviews.title: Durable bean bag that holds its shape
customer_reviews.text: As far as bean bags go, this one is superior. First of all, it is large enough for any adult and it has held its shape well with going flat, loosing stuffing or any of the other typical bean bag annoyances. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Beware - Flat as a pancake - others warned and I didn't listen
customer_reviews.text: Please beware - it arrives very flat and unuseable, there were a few reviews saying this and I didn't heed their waring- I kept it in the box too long while my kid's rooms were being renovated and now stuck with a flat product. If you want to buy more stuffing then the product is very well made just not if you don't want to invest more money into an already expensive item. Their policy is that you have to tell them within 30 days so be careful and open right away so you can get your money back.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Fields

customer_reviews.title: Big bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice, big bag. Great for adults, but my 7 and 9 year old children love it since they sit in it simultaneously.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mohr

customer_reviews.title: This medium sized bag is super comfortable and is large enough to accommodate an adult ...
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most been bags these days, this bag truly contains the little styrofoam beads, not the foam wedges contained in the last bean bag I purchased. This medium sized bag is super comfortable and is large enough to accommodate an adult up to about 5'7", and not too heavy to move around like the foam wedge bags which are bulky and weigh a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Finney

customer_reviews.title: One year ago my wife bought one and my whole family loved it. This year we wanted another one
customer_reviews.text: This is my second flash bean bag. One year ago my wife bought one and my whole family loved it. This year we wanted another one, despite the price was $15 higher, we ordered an identical one. However, we can immediately tell the difference. The old one has more fillings than the new one, and very comfortable. The new one has only two-third of the filling beans, and can barely hold an adult from sitting on the ground. We are very disappointed with the quality of the new product. They wanted to reduce the cost by reducing the material quantity and quality, and increased the price. This is not a way to do a sustainable business.
customer_reviews.author: cyberyu

customer_reviews.title: Im kinda disappointed, I was expecting so much more when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Im kinda disappointed, I was expecting so much more when I got this. There is not nearly enough beans inside the bag, and it is really kinda flat :-(
customer_reviews.author: Heather M. Walker

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is really happy with her new bean bag
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is really happy with her new bean bag. She loves how large it is and she finds it very comfortable to lounge in. I've seen both my girls (ages 11 & 12) snuggling in it together. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael's_treasures

customer_reviews.title: Nice size.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size.. bigger then I thought it would be.. Very pleased.. Nice and full.. for the price you can't go wrong.. Ordered a purple one.. hope it is just like the pink one..
customer_reviews.author: Kim T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: She loves it! My 11 year old niece is in love. The box was huge when it arrived and the bean bag was too. I sat in it myself and it actually relieved some pressure off my back...I have a lot of back pain. Im considering buying one for my own house. Photo soon!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Turner

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves this
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter's birthday. She loves it and plays with it every day. She derives so much joy from this simple but effective poof, that I have to give it an A+++++!!
customer_reviews.author: thenautigal

customer_reviews.title: Already busting
customer_reviews.text: Bag is already leaking foam beads. Only had it 2 months. Disappointed for the price I paid
customer_reviews.author: duane zepeda

customer_reviews.title: The Bean Bag was a Christmas gift for my grandson ...
customer_reviews.text: The Bean Bag was a Christmas gift for my grandson ... he loves it! I was impressed by the quality of the product. The "bag" can be removed for cleaning, and if it's for a younger user, the zipper has a clasp to latch it from opening.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality insert
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these beanbags for my grandchildren last Christmas. The material the inserts are made of is different in each. One is a flimsy nylon whose seams have ruptured in many places. It took me 2 hours to mend them all which I am sure is only a temporary fix. Poor quality inserts even for that price. Gramma Jan
customer_reviews.author: Janet Crozier

customer_reviews.title: The Beanbag is fine, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The Beanbag is fine, comfortable. However the Zipper is very difficult making it hard to remove the cloth covering for washing.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Diller

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is.
customer_reviews.text: The seams on the inner sac burst easily, so be ready for a godawful mess of styrofoam beans everywhere when you take the outer cover off to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Kenney

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Looks very cheap. Should only have paid 49.99 for it. I feel robbed. It will not last long flimsy cheap cover. Not dark brown like shown. Will show every spot.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Great seating for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: The students love having this big blue bean bag chair in our student lounge. it provides additional seating and does not take a great deal of space in a small area. It is also really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Colette M. Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Both she and her 7 month old sister fit in it very comfortably. She says she loves it and the smile ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bean bag for my 10 year old granddaughter. Both she and her 7 month old sister fit in it very comfortably. She says she loves it and the smile on her face when she sits in it seems to confirm that! The covering is sturdy and I think will hold up well over the long term.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne M. Mount

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: doesn't give off any bad odor. this is actually a bit larger than i expected and i am very satisfied. great quality and very easy to shape it the way you want. i'm 5'7" and 120 lbs, i easily fit in this chair and sometimes fall asleep on it.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Darcy O.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, fully stuffed
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, fully stuffed, durable bean bag . . . it's almost too full, probably just needs broke in. The grandchildren are toddlers and by the size of it, they should be able to take this bean bag to college. A little pricier than I wanted to spend but it's well made.
customer_reviews.author: Walter H. Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one and my daughter loves it. You can take the cover off and wash it which is great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pyle

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This was a good value for the money. It felt a little stiff at first, but quickly was broken in and feels comfortable without falling flat. It is large enough to sit on with my 4 year old. After 6 months use I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Bear

customer_reviews.title: Discolored plastic parts of my dryer
customer_reviews.text: Got the bean bag with red cover today. Took the cover over to sterilize in dryer for 20 minutes. The red cover discolored the plastic parts of the dryer permanently! When I go over it with a lint roller, it’s shedding red. Not as comfortable as I thought it would be either. I’m concerned it’s going to discolor other things as well.
customer_reviews.author: L. Park

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love a good bean bag chair? :)
customer_reviews.text: I can't comment on the particulars because it belongs to my granddaughter, but she loves it. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: my2centsworth

customer_reviews.title: Super nice
customer_reviews.text: So glad I went with this rather than one of those little kids ones for my 9 yr old, this will last him even as a teen, great size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Big and comfy. I would not say comfortable for two adults but regardless it is comfortable. Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Fontana

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: There is not enough filling inside the bag. My butt hits the floor when I sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: The Bose

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my five year old granddaughter. She has been thrilled with the chair and uses it consistently. She finds it so comfortable she falls asleep in it. So does their dog when he can get away with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: ... of if it last that long)-came full not flat like some reviews-so far no problems she loves it-has even ...
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my granddaughter age 10-great size for her (bought another one that was way too small this one she will get many years out of if it last that long)-came full not flat like some reviews-so far no problems she loves it-has even done running jumps on it & no ill effects yet.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Ash

customer_reviews.title: Like it, but the internal bag material has a poor quality
customer_reviews.text: If you have kids who like to jump on it be ready for it to quickly loose its shape. That's because the internal bag is of poor quality material. I sewed it after a month of usage and filled with another bag of beans, but it got torn again a couple of weeks later. I wish I could buy another good quality internal bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sergey

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: They were for my grand daughters and they loved them! They are made very well and the zipper comes with tiny keys so you can lock it so they can not open it and remove the stuffing...They are large and have plenty of room in them to sit or lay!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: A great product! Large enough to get comfortable and warm ...
customer_reviews.text: A great product ! Large enough to get comfortable and warm enough when you sit in it. Not cold like the ones made of vinyl . Very dressy for a living room. We Love em !
customer_reviews.author: CaCooper

customer_reviews.title: Not for me or the two year old I bought it for.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like this product. It was very hard and uncomfortable three days in. The material was course and abrasive. Not at all what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: MsAnne

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, nice quality, and I really like that you can remove the cover and wash it. Also that you can refill it will beads/beans as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Myers

customer_reviews.title: Were purchased for a 9 and 11 year old and they were perfect. They are holding up nicely as
customer_reviews.text: Big, full and comfy. Were purchased for a 9 and 11 year old and they were perfect. They are holding up nicely as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was a bit disappointed by the actual size of the Chair
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed by the actual size of the Chair. It states that it is "over sized". I found it to be the same size as most other Bean Bag Chairs that I have seen in Dept. stores and about $30.00 more than the others I Have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Icey

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: This item has mixed reviews but I love this chair! Ours came pre-filled and there are plenty of beans for a comfortable fit. I am tall (5'10") but it is big enough for me to sit easily in the middle. It is simple to move around and the brown color matches our couches. This is a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great Beanbag!
customer_reviews.text: This beanbag has become a favorite for everyone in the house since we got it. So comfortable and the material is soft and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a Good quality bean bag for a reasonable price! It was a bit too dull for our taste, but removing the bead was very easy. The material is sturdy and the cover can be removed and machine washed.
customer_reviews.author: NewmanSmith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The size is great! My roommate and I each bought one for our apartment living room and they are awesome, plenty big for a full grown person. The color matches the picture and is quite comfortable. Good quality, though I've only had it a few days so I can't speak on longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Sue45456

customer_reviews.title: This is super comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I am thirteen years old and received this for my birthday. It is a great place to relax and read a book. Unfortunately the inner lining broke after a very short time. I sewed it up and that fixed it. Now it has ripped again. So annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Merisa A. Halperin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old grand daughter loves this. It has plenty of filling.
customer_reviews.author: susieq

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love their bean bag chairs!
customer_reviews.text: This bean bag chair was a huge hit with my granddaughter at Christmas! So much so that my grandson wanted one for his birthday, which of course grandma bought for him!
customer_reviews.author: Pidge

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the money
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for several months and its flattening out already. Ten-year-old daughter isn't unduly rough with it. The cover material is decent and i like that it can unzip to refill.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Darling

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Great bean bags - we have them for 2 months now and boys (8 and 7 years old) sit on them all the time playing video games, watching tv, and reading. They haven't changed its shape and are still as good as new. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Wubzy

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bean bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bean bag. Much larger than the kid size bean bags in Target and a good price. My eight year old daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: fernfam

customer_reviews.title: Very large and not very soft
customer_reviews.text: Very "stiff" for lack of a better word, does not adjust to the body well, and quite large. Would return but it just too much of a hassel.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bailey

customer_reviews.title: plump
customer_reviews.text: had it 2 years and the inner lining is tearing. Cant find another inner linging to go in with out paying an arm and leg. Thats my only complaint. Other wise it is a sturdy outside covering
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: Busted a hole in tbe inner lining right away. Have little balls everywhere. Not well made.
customer_reviews.author: So and To's mama.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great bean bag, and is quality made. Big enough for my four year and I to cuddle in:)
customer_reviews.author: j rocket

customer_reviews.title: Durable. Longest lasting bean bag chair we’ve owned. ...
customer_reviews.text: Durable. Longest lasting bean bag chair we’ve owned. Had about 3 others (other brands)that barely made it a year.
customer_reviews.author: Matt M

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this beanbag! It was bigger than I expected but all the better. Its a great value for what you get. I think its a tad bit overstuffed so I need to pull some beans out but other than that its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: This bean bag is HUGE!!!! I looked everywhere for a decent priced bean bag for my pre-teen. I purchased this bean bag not sure if Id get what I wanted and it beat my expectations! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: This is in my top 5 best purchases I’ve ever made for my little girl! There has not been a day that has went buy since the year and a half ago that you bought this that This has not been used!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 7 year old grandchild.
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I had expected, but great for a child to curl up in and read as well as to take a little snooze.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: This Bean Bag is very well made. Our 3 grandchildren abuse it often, and it has stood up to the assault...
customer_reviews.author: Errol Daniels

product_meta.title: Flash Furniture Oversized Solid Navy Blue Bean Bag Chair for Kids and Adults
product_meta.description: Color:Navy BlueCreate a hangout spot in the bedroom, library, craft room, dorm, or family room with this cozy oversized bean bag chair. Floor chairs are great for any room that can be pulled out at any time to be wallow in. Add flexible seating in the corner of your classroom where students can congregate to socialize or read. Having fun seating in the classroom can create a unique and more enjoyable learning experience. Filled with refillable polystyrene polymeric beads, this lounge chair easily conforms to your body for an incredible seating experience. A metal safety zipper secures the beads and prevents them from leaking out. The upholstery can be spot cleaned with a damp cloth or remove the slipcover for machine washing when a damp cloth just won't do it. Bean bags are cool chairs for young kids, teenagers and college students due to their casual nature designed for lounging. Pair this large bean bag chair with our small version for a footrest to make your perfect lounge setting. Not only comfortable for relaxing, their lightweight design makes them portable and versatile.
feature_bullets: Add comfortable seating to your living room, bedroom, dorm, playroom or classroom with this flexible bean bag chair for kids and adults.
PRODUCT MEASUREMENTS >>> Overall Size: 42"W x 42"D x 19"H
